attributes.action: Table a motion to expel Israel from the United Nations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When Israel was first admitted as a member of the United Nations in 1949, it was conditional of a declaration by it's then government that it, "Unreservedly accepts the obligations of the United Nations Charter and undertakes to honour them from the day it became a member of the United Nations." - General Assembly Resolution 273, 11 May 1949.

Since Israel out and out refuses to comply with several UN Resolutions stacked up against them, the time has now come to suspend them from the UN and place sanctions against them until they start to comply with International Law.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Table a motion to expel Israel from the United Nations."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20352


Prime Minister's Office
